name: Pipo Dream Friend
description:
Problems with dreaming?

Get Pipo Dream Friend!!

Now you can enter your dreams and play with them!

Pipo has the ability to make you lucid in the dream world.

Arrows= Move/Change Scene

A= Change/Interact/Shake

B= Shoot/Interact

Start= Menu

Select=Menu

Skarmuse (Art/Code/Music/SFX/3D Sprites):

OneCardPony (Sprites):

Other Sprites used:

Small Animals

Sprite pack 16x16

Game for the:

Use the Sameboy Emulator for a better experience. (No buzzing sound)

Warning:

A little violence and scary stuff included..
